# Nett hier. Aber waren Sie schon mal in Baden-W端rttemberg?

"Nett hier. Aber waren Sie schon mal in Baden-W端rttemberg?" (English: Nice here. But have you ever been to Baden-W端rttemberg?) is a slogan from a 1999 marketing campaign by Scholz & Friends for the German state of Baden-W端rttemberg. In later years, the slogan has been printed on stickers which have spread globally.
